header.description:
Instructions: -Move the paddle with your finger. -When you break all the bricks, you continue on the next level. -If you lose all your lives, game over.
Updates: 1.1: First update, add score and lives show 1.1.1: manual icon, fix lives show 1.1.2: update manual icon and fix again lives show
It took me like 10 hours to finish, so i hope you like it :) I'm fine if you remix it! (you could add new levels!)
You can make your own levels here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/238004375/
Made by SergioFLSgmd
